_sText:
After stranding on the isolated island saving urself from the zombies in the dragonball world,a boat comes by the island. Happy with rescue u and ur team climb the boat in hope of rescue but swiftly hope runs down... As for the boat is a ghostship ,missing crew and power,u urself have to find a way of the boat and onto mainland!!
Unfortanetly one of ure team got infected and decided to keep it a secret,leaving u with two problems
Find a way of the boat,and survive the oncomming plague!!


Tips:
The best way to escape a boat is to get to the highest point possible!!
When stuck think of this-Thru the fire and the flames ,lies salvation

Note:includes The grendel song "zombie nation" and a working disco (as always all is controlled by a dj's setup!)

Note: Ze_Ghostship was made before Ze_Mad_DragonballZ ,it lacks alot in realism but i hope it makes up in gameplay,this was my first map to ever finish,to ever finish,not my first try:p but stil... it shows

Inspired by roy the ship and escapes like atix heli and island escape i give you ghostship,the newest in escape map.


Credits to eastsider and westsider and all the others who helped me when i had mapping problems


Note!!!: edit your server.cfg file!!!! the command "net_maxfilesize" has to be put larger then 25mb at least to make it possible for people to connect!!!
(this command negotiates the maximum amount of mb allowed to download from server)
